Reviews.Content: Pleasant and not too distant Spotless hotel with friendly staff and efficient service. Not within walking easy distance of the centre but a direct bus stops right outside and take about 15 minutes. Hotel sells bus tickets.Hot water in the shower was tepid one evening, I'd have ignored it however my partner loves a hot shower. She phoned reception and a man came up immediately, his English wasn't great and he didn't achieve much but he was friendly and tried - bless. When we checked out my partner mentioned it and we were given about a 20% discount - they were very apologetic and offered it without us pushing for it. Gave me a rosy glow.I'd stay again, although would try for somewhere more central first (but then you pay more and some of them looked terrible).
Reviews.Author: Comfortluver

Reviews.Content: Decent place, but I would not call it a 4-star This is a decent place right next to the airport with a great staff. The cab ride was a little expensive for less than 1km (11 Euro) so we walked to the airport on our return journey. The rooms were clean and the bed was nice, but the decor is definately a throwback to the 70's complete with a green bathroom and orange carpet. The breakfast was continental buffet and offered meats, cheese, two cereal selections, milk, yogurt, and best of all real American coffee. Getting into Florence city-center was a piece of cake with the bus stop right outside and only a 15-20 minute journey (1,20 Euro each way with tickets sold at the front desk). There are no real complaints especially considering the rate: just beware of the star rating.
Reviews.Author: tkapts

Reviews.Content: Great Hotel For the Price We stayed here for 3 nights. Couldn't have had a better experience.We stayed at this hotel in August, 2006. We were very pleased with it. Its quiet, comfortable, rooms are clean and very nice staff. There is an a/c, good tv channels and comfortable bed.The bad thing about this hotel is that its far from the tourist attractions. This wasn't a big problem for us because we took the bus to the attractions. Bus is easy to use and right beside the hotel, 100metres away. Staff if excellent and very helpful.B+ for my overall
Reviews.Author: mcinb

Reviews.Content: Great Hotel with clean rooms, friendly staff at good value for Money Stayed here for a long weekend. Rooms were tidy and neat with flat screen TV's. Bathrooms were clean and modern with good shower etc.Hotel breakfast buffet had a good selection on offer and generally the hotel was well run with helpful staff .OK the hotel is not in the city centre but there is a bus stop ( next to Petrol station ) very close to get you into the city centre in no time. ( The bus picks you up and drops you at the same stop as its on the end of a loop - NB Stamp your tickets when you first get on the bus in the machine on board ) We got our tickets from Rosy's bar near the bus stop - Not bad place for a nightcap if you still need a Morretti or two )I enjoyed staying here and it ticks all the boxes if you want a safe clean and good value for money stay.
Reviews.Author: Catdangler

Reviews.Content: Great place to stay We spent 3 nights at this hotel and it worked out perfectly for sightseeing in Florence. The bus stops about 100 meters from the hotel and it's about a 20 minute ride into the city. The bus comes every 7 minutes or so. The hotel was decent and was fine for what we needed. The rooms were clean, employees were helpful, breakfast was included. I'd stay there again.
Reviews.Author: TravelNovice
